tool_description: Creates customized retainer agreements based on client information, case details, and fee structures with jurisdiction-specific legal language.

client_name.description: Full legal name of the client

attorney_name.description: Full name of the attorney or firm

case_description.description: Description of legal services to be provided

fee_structure.description: Fee arrangement type (hourly, flat_fee, contingency, hybrid)

estimated_hours.description: Estimated total hours for the case

error_messages: Invalid fee structure: Use hourly, flat_fee, contingency, or hybrid
Missing hourly rate: Hourly rate required when fee_structure is hourly or hybrid
Invalid contingency percentage: Must be between 0-50 when fee_structure is contingency
Missing required information: client_name, attorney_name, case_description, fee_structure, and jurisdiction are required
Invalid retainer amount: Retainer amount must be 0 or positive number
Invalid jurisdiction: Provide a valid legal jurisdiction
usage: Provide client name, attorney name, case description, fee structure, and jurisdiction. Include relevant fee parameters (hourly_rate, retainer_amount, contingency_percentage) based on fee structure. The tool generates a compliant retainer agreement.
